  • Method Details

    • printFromBoard

      public void printFromBoard(Board board, PlayerHand hand, BoardArgument boardArgument, QuestCard playerQuest)
      Prints a PlayerBoard followed by his PlayerHand and PlayerQuest. When argument is not null it alters the board's printing
      Parameters:
      board - the board that has to be printed
      hand - the client's hand
      boardArgument - input from player
      playerQuest - player's personal QuestCard

    • printFromPublicBoard

      public void printFromPublicBoard(PlaceInPublicBoard<ResourceCard> resourceCards, PlaceInPublicBoard<GoldCard> goldCards, PlaceInPublicBoard<QuestCard> questCards, PlayerHand hand, String argument, QuestCard playerQuest)
      Prints a PublicBoard followed by player's PlayerHand and PlayerQuest. Helps with a player's card pick choice
      Parameters:
      resourceCards - the PublicBoard's ResourceCards
      goldCards - the PublicBoard's GoldCards
      questCards - the PublicBoard's QuestCards
      hand - player's hand
      argument - player's input
      playerQuest - player's personal quest card

    • printInitialCardChoice

      public void printInitialCardChoice(InitialCard initialCard)
      Prints initial InitialCard's side choice
      Parameters:
      initialCard - the InitialCard that has to be printed

    • printQuestCardChoice

      public void printQuestCardChoice(QuestCard quest1, QuestCard quest2)
      Prints initial QuestCard choice
      Parameters:
      quest1 - the first QuestCard
      quest2 - the second QuestCard

    • cleanTerminal

      public static void cleanTerminal()
